what: Manage Glossary for R Translation Projects
title: Manage Glossary for R Translation Projects
text: goal package manage glossary R translation projects. idea based proposal created Saranjeet Kaur Bhogal (@SaranjeetKaur). project launched R Dev Day @ RSE Con25. repo currently Work Progress.

title: Manage Glossary for R Translation Projects
text: can install development version glossary GitHub :

title: Manage Glossary for R Translation Projects
text: repository uses precommit. install run , follow steps : external terminal run pip3 install pre-commit --user (Windows) brew install pre-commit (macOS). Based level permissions , either directly clone repository clone fork repository local directory. Install {devtools} {precommit} package. Run precommit::use_precommit() console.
code: git clone https://github.com/r-devel/glossary (or git clone https://github.com/USER_NAME/glossary, if it is your fork of the repo) cd glossary install.packages("devtools") install.packages("precommit")
